events.message: Received application from candidate John Doe for the software engineer position, including resume and cover letter.
Categorized John's application under Engineering after confirming relevant experience in software development and devops.
Assigned recruiter Sarah Collins to John Doe's profile to manage the interview scheduling process and candidate communications.
Completed initial phone screening with John to evaluate his technical background and motivation for the software engineer role.
Received positive response from John confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Scheduled technical interview with John for May 10th at 10:00 AM to assess skills in software development and system design.
Technical interview with John completed successfully; he demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and relevant engineering experience.
HR interview scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture fit and benefits with candidate John Doe.
HR interview completed positively; John expressed enthusiasm for the role and alignment with company values.
Extended formal job offer to John for the software engineer position including salary, benefits, and start date details.
Received feedback from John indicating acceptance of the offer pending minor clarification on benefits.
John officially accepted the job offer and confirmed his start date as June 1st, expressing excitement to join the team.
John's onboarding process started with introduction sessions, setup of development environment, and HR orientations.
Recruitment process completed successfully with John integrated into the engineering team and all formalities finalized.
